version_description:
Let's celebrate the Holidays!

- Run in the snow-covered streets of New Work
- Join Santa Claus in the Himalayas
- Enjoy a lovely new winter theme in the menu
- We removed the series of holes and very small platforms for the Ninja
- The

Let's celebrate the Holidays!

- Run in the snow-covered streets of New Work
- Join Santa Claus in the Himalayas
- Enjoy a lovely new winter theme in the menu
- We removed the series of holes and very small platforms for the Ninja
- The
You can now eat your Facebook friends! Exchange civilians and compete in a leaderboard. We also added a new vehicle to flip (an airplane), and many bug fix and improvements.
You can now eat your Facebook friends! Exchange civilians and compete in a leaderboard. We also added a new vehicle to flip (an airplane), and many bug fix and improvements.

Bye bye Xmas theme, see you next year! This version has better performances and fixes a few minor bugs.

We are working on new cool stuffs for your zombies in 2014, thank you all for playing Zombie Tsunami !

Bye bye Xmas theme, see you next year! This version has better performances and fixes a few minor bugs.

We are working on new cool stuffs for your zombies in 2014, thank you all for playing Zombie Tsunami !

- iCloud support
- Synchronization between devices if you connect to Facebook
- The coin doubler is now restorable (does not work if you bought it in an older version, contact us in this case)
- The Last Chance item will also slow down the game t

- iCloud support
- Synchronization between devices if you connect to Facebook
- The coin doubler is now restorable (does not work if you bought it in an older version, contact us in this case)
- The Last Chance item will also slow down the game t

- New daily bonus : get 3 diamonds every day (requires an internet connection)
- Watch video ads to earn 2 diamonds (requires an internet connection)
- 45 diamonds if you update from a previous version (requires an internet connection)
- Removed

- New daily bonus : get 3 diamonds every day (requires an internet connection)
- Watch video ads to earn 2 diamonds (requires an internet connection)
- 45 diamonds if you update from a previous version (requires an internet connection)
- Removed

- Support for iOS 9, iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus
- Support for 3D Touch in the lottery ticket and the credits menu
- Fix a major bug with the balloon that could cause a freeze
- Improve some visual effects
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Support for iOS 9, iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus
- Support for 3D Touch in the lottery ticket and the credits menu
- Fix a major bug with the balloon that could cause a freeze
- Improve some visual effects
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

version_name: 3.0.2 fixes a few bugs with the bonus Mecha and some missions                                                                                                                                                                                Version 3.0.0

version_description:
The biggest update ever:
- new pets, the Zombirds to help you in your missions
- new bonuses, Mecha and Bikerz
- new backgrounds, San Francisco and Jurassic
- new skills and missions
- a lot of new hats
- many bug fixes

Spread th
